trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around January 9th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsi was in my backyard late at night with my brother eatin tacos, when we see this eery red light glooming in the stary night. we were mystifed. then it started coming towards us when the wind started picking up very quickly. it landed on the ground, and a creature came out. then it grabbed my brother, and started walking back. then it turned around, and said in exact words " i. am. god. i will come back for you." it very sadly took my brother up into the sky, and dropped him from 40,00 thousand feet up. he died. i am sad.
